entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:55 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 96 %

Wind: NNE 20 km/h gust 31 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries late in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
